name: Let's Get Quizzical Too | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who said, 'The length of a film should be directly related to the endurance of the human bladder'?
Who is the patron saint of soldiers?
Which is not a house of Hogwart's School of Witchcraft and Wizardry but an evil wizard who killed Harry Potter's parents?
Who was the 1959 Nobel Prize winner for Literature for his lyrical poetry?
What does the WD stand for on a can of WD40?
Who said, 'Marriage is a wonderful invention, but, then again, so is a bicycle repair kit'?
Which city has a bridge called Ponte Vecchio?
What animal accounts for more human fatalities than any other African animal?
Who were jeans originally made for?
Whose autobiography was 'Diary of a Genius'?
